title: Beyond One-Size-Fits-All: Multi-Domain, Multi-Task Framework for Embedding Model Selection
abstract: arXiv:2404.00458v1 Announce Type: new  Abstract: This position paper proposes a systematic approach towards developing a framework to help select the most effective embedding models for natural language processing (NLP) tasks, addressing the challenge posed by the proliferation of both proprietary and open-source encoder models.

Title: Beyond One-Size-Fits-All: Multi-Domain, Multi-Task Framework for Embedding Model Selection
Abstract: arXiv:2404.00458v1 Announce Type: new  Abstract: This position paper proposes a systematic approach towards developing a framework to help select the most effective embedding models for natural language processing (NLP) tasks, addressing the challenge posed by the proliferation of both proprietary and open-source encoder models.
translated_title: 超越一刀切：多领域、多任务框架用于嵌入模型选择
translated_abstract: 这篇立场论文提出了一种系统方法，旨在开发一个框架，帮助选择适用于自然语言处理（NLP）任务的最有效的嵌入模型，解决了专有和开源编码器模型大量增加所带来的挑战。
tldr: 开发了一个多领域、多任务框架，帮助选择最有效的自然语言处理嵌入模型。
en_tdlr: Developed a multi-domain, multi-task framework to help select the most effective natural language processing embedding models.
